tagline_connect_everywhere: Stay connected anytime, anywhere, with anyone.
value_collaboration: Seamless collaboration across teams and devices.
value_reliability: Trusted by businesses worldwide for reliable communication.
value_integration: Integrates with your favorite tools for maximum productivity.

value_security: Enterprise-grade security to protect your data.
value_flexibility: Work your way with flexible communication options.

promo_customer_success: Join thousands of companies boosting productivity with RingCentral.
promo_innovation: Powering the future of work with innovative communication solutions.
notification_new_message: {count, plural, one {You have # new message.} other {You have # new messages.}}
team_member_added: {count, plural, one {# new team member joined your workspace.} other {# new team members joined your workspace.}}
